name: Ronald Reagan RPG
description:
Introducing Ronald Reagan RPG...

The game where you can solve all the worlds problems as the 40th commander in chief...

Travel across the United States and around the world
Debate Jimmy Carter to defeat the villainous democrats
Answer tons of 80's Trivia on topics from pop music to current events
Explore Washington D.C. and visit it's various landmarks
Retort reporters hardball, and softball questions
Pursue international and domestic political intrigue
Get stuck in rush hour traffic
Relive various moments from your classic film career
Collect countless collectibles
Free the Iranian hostages 
Plus much much more...

Save the world through limited government and supply side economics in Ronald Reagan RPG...

Please play, donate, and provide feedback...

Thank you, 

God bless you, 

and God Bless the United States of America...
